Create web services using Business Gateway APIs

Use HM Land Registry's developer pack to explore APIs, review documentation and check endpoints.

What's new

14 March 2025: HM Land Registry (HMLR) is developing a new service to improve the process of submitting information to HMLR.

The new Submit an application to change the Land Register API will help to lodge applications with HMLR to update the register or create a new lease or transfer of part. This new API will replace the existing e-DRS SOAP API and is designed to help applicants get their applications right the first time.

Read more about the new Submit an application to change the Land Register API.

For a summary of changes, visit our developer pack changelog.
